page.title: 08A BUDDHIST FAMILY
page.content: Because of their{ATTITUDE to {Buddhism,}Mr & Mrs Jackson moved from Bedford to St Margaret's near Great Gaddesden in August 1985 to be near the monastery .Mr Jackson has been a BUDDHIST for 33 years, and his wife has been one for 12.They practise Indian & Sri Lankan Buddhism and their lives are centred on their faith.Mrs Jackson works as a STEWARD at the monastery and spends over half her week there. Mr Jackson is a chartered SURVEYOR. They find the area pleasant and the people happy and they enjoy living in a rural area.
